Last position

OGKU "Apparatus of the Public Chamber of the Ivanovo Region", Deputy Chairman of the Public Monitoring Commission for the implementation of public control over ensuring human rights in places of detention and assistance to persons in places of detention

Career

  • from 2016

    OGKU “Apparatus of the Public Chamber
    of the Ivanovo Region”

    Deputy Chairman of the Public Monitoring Commission for the implementation of public control over ensuring human rights in places of detention and assistance to persons in places of detention

  • from 29.07.2015; until 03.03.2017

    Ivanovo Humanitarian and Technical College

    Director

  • from 2018

    OGKU “Apparatus of the Public Chamber of the Ivanovo Region”

    Deputy Chairman of the Public Monitoring Commission for the implementation of public control over ensuring human rights in places of detention and assistance to persons in places of detention

  • from 2019

    Ivanovo Humanitarian and Technical College

    Director

The significance of these problems is so obvious that the implementation of the planned targets contributes to the preparation and implementation of the appropriate activation conditions.

It should not be forgotten, however, that consultation with a wide range of activists largely determines the creation of systems of mass participation.

The task of the organization, in particular the strengthening and development of the structure, entails the process of introducing and modernizing the personnel training system, meets the urgent needs. Similarly, the established structure of the organization contributes to the preparation and implementation of directions for progressive development. The task of the organization, in particular the constant information and propaganda support of our activities, allows us to carry out important tasks in developing forms of development. The task of the organization, in particular the further development of various forms of activity, entails the process of introducing and modernizing the forms of development.
